name: XENO - Puzzle experience BETA
description:
WELCOME to XENO Puzzle experience BETA !

Feedback Google HERE

Good game !

> Controls :
  • P : Pause menu
  • Echap : Fullscreen exit
  • Mouse : Player move
> Scenario :

Play as the only survivor of the Star META!

For a very long time, all the peoples of the universe lived perfectly in harmony.

However, during a strange phenomenon, parasites are usually on each "safe haven". They feed mainly on the resources of each planet!

Your mission is therefore to secure these resources and restore peace.

A puzzle game with a unique visual and sound experience, with many levels and reflection.
